revision.text: {{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=14:19, 18 May 2010 |action1link=Talk:Bardanes Tourkos/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=362811287 |action2=WAR |action2date=12:21, 12 March 2012 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Bardanes Tourkos |action2result=approved |action2oldid=480666524 |dykdate=4 May 2010 |dykentry=... that before beginning his revolt in 803, '''[[Bardanes Tourkos]]''', with his three principal associates, [[Thomas the Slav|Thomas]], [[Leo V the Armenian|Leo the Armenian]] and [[Michael II|Michael the Amorian]], allegedly visited a monk who foretold their fates?] |currentstatus=GA |topic=War }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Biography|living=no|class=A|military-priority=Low|military-work-group=yes|listas=Tourkos, Bardanes}} {{WikiProject Military history |A-Class=pass |class=A | B1 = y | B2 = y | B3 = y | B4 = y | B5 = y |Biography=yes|Medieval=yes|Roman=yes}} {{WikiProject Greece|class=A | b1 = yes | b2 = yes | b3 = yes | b4 = yes | b5 = yes |importance=Mid|topic=history|byzantine-task-force=yes}} {{WikiProject Middle Ages|class=GA|importance=Low}} }} {{Talk:Bardanes Tourkos/GA1}} == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:8|one external link|8 external links}} on [[Bardanes Tourkos]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=746414893 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information.
